name: Windward Plains
description: A diverse region filled with sandy deserts, swaying grasslands, and twisting rock formations. The first new hunting locale in the Forbidden Lands, experiencing the Sandtide Inclemency.

pointsOfInterest.name: Sandtide Dunes
pointsOfInterest.description: Vast sandy dunes where the Sandtide storm is most intense. The roiling sandstorm here is filled with thunder, making it a treacherous area to navigate.

pointsOfInterest.name: Twisted Spires
pointsOfInterest.description: Unique rock formations sculpted by wind and sand over millennia. These natural structures provide shelter from the Sandtide for both hunters and monsters alike.

pointsOfInterest.name: Thunder Basin
pointsOfInterest.description: A lowland area where lightning frequently strikes during the Sandtide. Known to be the territory of Rey Dau, the apex predator of the region.

pointsOfInterest.name: Whispering Grasslands
pointsOfInterest.description: Expansive plains with tall grass swaying in the constant winds. Home to various herbivores and the hunting grounds for Doshaguma packs.

pointsOfInterest.name: Kunafa, Windsong Village
pointsOfInterest.description: A settlement located in the Windward Plains, and the home of the Seikret. The cheese produced by the livestock the people here keep is an essential part of their diet.

pointsOfInterest.name: Quicksand Pits
pointsOfInterest.description: Treacherous areas of unstable sand, known to be the hunting grounds of the Balahara, a desert-dwelling Leviathan.

pointsOfInterest.name: Scorched Flats
pointsOfInterest.description: A barren area often patrolled by Quematrice, Brute Wyverns known for their fire-based attacks and long tails.

name: Scarlet Forest
description: A verdant forest with towering trees and abundant water, characterized by peculiar red-colored water on the forest floor. This land experiences an Inclemency known as the Downpour, a torrential rainstorm that floods the surrounding area.

pointsOfInterest.name: Crimson Canopy
pointsOfInterest.description: The heart of the Scarlet Forest, where the tallest trees form a dense canopy. The red-tinted water pools beneath, creating a surreal landscape.

pointsOfInterest.name: Flooded Groves
pointsOfInterest.description: Low-lying areas of the forest that are frequently submerged during the Downpour. The flooded terrain becomes a temporary aquatic ecosystem.

pointsOfInterest.name: Scarlet Falls
pointsOfInterest.description: A majestic waterfall where the red-tinted water cascades down moss-covered cliffs, creating a breathtaking spectacle.

pointsOfInterest.name: Uth Duna's Domain
pointsOfInterest.description: A treacherous area known to be the territory of Uth Duna, the Leviathan apex predator of the Scarlet Forest.

pointsOfInterest.name: Blooming Hollows
pointsOfInterest.description: A network of tree hollows and crevices where the Temnoceran Lala Barina makes its home, surrounded by rose-like structures.

pointsOfInterest.name: Mist-Shrouded Glade
pointsOfInterest.description: A mysterious area where mist constantly lingers, created by the interaction between the warm forest air and the cool water.

pointsOfInterest.name: Verdant Haven
pointsOfInterest.description: A small research outpost established by the Hunter's Guild to study the unique ecosystem of the Scarlet Forest.

pointsOfInterest.name: Wudwud Hideout
pointsOfInterest.description: A secluded area deep within the Scarlet Forest where the Wudwuds, a Lynian tribe native to this region, have established their hidden community.

name: Oilwell Basin
description: A volcanic region where oil wells and raging fires burn. Home to unique creatures that have adapted to its harsh environment.

pointsOfInterest.name: Azuz, the Everforge
pointsOfInterest.description: The village of Azuz formed around its large forge.
